Passenger communications

By centralizing your transit passenger communications network, we transform up-to-the-second insights into valuable passenger communications— operational network status down to escalator status and all in between.

Centralized content, multiple touchpoints

All content is managed from a single delivery platform and distributed as public address, interactive media, dynamic communications, emergency messaging, and more. Scalable and endlessly versatile, our passenger communications solutions stretch out across many touchpoints.

01.

Interactive kiosks

Interactive kiosks offer easy public access to schedules, planners, emergency notifications, and engaging media from multiple sources via intuitive touchscreens.
02.

Station communications

We connect transit operators and passengers through different media, all adaptable and easy to use.
03.

Train & Bus communications

We connect transit operators and passengers through different media, all adaptable and easy to navigate. As part of our CAD/AVL solution, we provide real-time, multimodal information to bus passengers, merging all data sources into one homogeneous information ecosystem to the service of passengers, wherever they may be in the transit network.
04.

Mobile and web application

The intuitive interface, compatible with mobile or web, offers the public real-time information and interactive features like trip planning and station navigation.
